data.title: Draymond Green Show - Mavericks Win Game 4 Breakdown w/ Derek Fisher #Champ
data.meta_description: The Herd with Colin Cowherd is a thought-provoking, opinionated, and topic-driven journey through the top sports stories of the day. Colin's unique take on the sports world and unprecedented storytelling ability entertains audiences around the country while making them think, laugh, and immediately react.
data.text:
The Herd with Colin Cowherd is a thought-provoking, opinionated, and topic-driven journey through the top sports stories of the day. Colin's unique...Full Bio

Draymond Green is joined by Los Angeles Lakers great Derek Fisher to break down Game 4 of the NBA Finals between the Boston Celtics and Dallas Mavericks. They discuss Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving leading the Mavs to a big night over Jayson Tatum and Jaylen Brown, whether or not the Shaq / Kobe Bryant Lakers would beat the Steph Curry and Kevin Durant Golden State Warriors, and the discourse around the growth of the WNBA behind Caitlin Clark and Angel Reese.

0:00 - Start

9:00 - Celtics/Mavs

17:00 - Luka's Defense

29:00 - Predictions

39:00 - Lakers vs. Warriors

46:00 Caitlin Clark Discourse

Produced by: Jackson Safon

#Volume #herd
